attributes.action: Extend Andover Memorial hospital opening hours to 24hrs
attributes.additional_details:
The nearest accident and emergency department is 17 miles away which is unacceptable for an area as large as ours.
This puts pressure on the emergency services for people with no transport or for problems out of hours
It also puts a huge amount of pressure on Winchester hospital
attributes.background: Andover memorial hospital accident and emergency department should be open longer than office hours

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local NHS services and facility opening hours are a matter for your local NHS Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find contact details for your local NHS Trust here: https://www.nhs.uk/servicedirectories/pages/nhstrustlisting.aspx
